data.question: What is the formula for the compound synthesized using Hdpt24?
What temperature were the mixtures heated to for the synthesis of [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2]?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of [Co(mdpt24)2]?
What method was used for crystal structure determination?
data.answer: Intensity data were collected on a Bruker Apex CCD area-detector diffractometer.

data.question: What is the crystal system for the compound [Co(dpt24)2]?
What is the difference in the formula weight between [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2]?
Based on the synthesis conditions, which compound has a higher elemental nitrogen content, [Co(dpt24)2] or [Co(mdpt24)2]?
data.answer: [Co(dpt24)2] has a higher elemental nitrogen content.

data.question: Is the space group for both [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2] the same?

Was the SQUEEZE routine applied to both [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2]?
Is the elemental analysis performed on a Perkin-Elmer 240 elemental analyzer?
What is the role of Et3N in the synthesis of [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2]?
data.answer: Et3N acts as a base in the reaction.

data.question: What is the purpose of heating the mixture at 160 oC for 3 days in the synthesis of [Co(dpt24)2]?
data.answer: The purpose is to facilitate the reaction and formation of the compound.

data.question: What does the term 'isostructural' imply about [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2]?
data.answer: It implies that [Co(dpt24)2] and [Co(mdpt24)2] have the same crystal structure.

data.answer: The Teflon-lined reactor is used to withstand high temperatures and pressures during the synthesis.
